title: Retirement Advisor: Some Risks Are Unaffordable
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The “The Baby Boomer Investing Show,” produced by Ron Surz and Kathy Tarochione, offers a perspective void of Wall Street sloganeering, combined with a rare financial sophistication. This podcast (8:34) considers why the lifecycle matters so much, explaining why near and new retirees shouldn’t risk what they cannot afford to lose.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
